content: swirl e socks i love self-striping sock yarn but sometimes want a little bit more oomph than a plain sock provides swirls add just the right amount of oomph while still keeping the sock simple and quick-to-knit this pattern includes instructions for a heel flap and gusset if you are using self-striping yarn and preserving the stripe sequence across the instep is important to you consider using a heel that makes that easier to do such as an afterthought heel or megan william s omg heel used in the sock pictured sizes 7 8 9 foot circumference suggested yarn knitterly things vesper sock yarn tumbleweed yarn aurora fingering weight needle us 1½ - 2 5mm gauge 8 sts = 1 in stockinette abbreviations k - knit k2tog - knit 2 stitches together p - purl pm - place marker round/rnds - round/rounds sl - slip ssk - slip each of the next 2 stitches knitwise to the right needle insert left needle through the front loops and knit the 2 stitches together st/sts - stitch/stitches instructions cast on 56 64 72 sts join for knitting in the round being careful not to twist sts pm to indicate the beginning of the round cuff rnd1 - *k2 p2* repeat to end of round repeat rnd1 until cuff measures 1 5 or desired length 1 © susie white 2014 leg work in pattern page 3 until leg measures 6 5 or desired length heel flap work first 28 32 36 sts in pattern as established making note of the last row in the pattern worked the slipped stitch heel flap will be worked across the second 28 32 36 sts as follows row 1 *sl1 k1* to end of row row 2 s1 p to end of row repeat row 1-2 until heel flap measures 2 5 or desired length heel turn turn heel as follows row 1 sl1 k16 18 20 ssk k1 turn row 2 sl1 p7 7 7 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl1 k to 1 st before the gap ssk k1 turn row 4 sl1 p to 1 st before the gap p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 & 4 until 18 20 22 sts remain gusset setup round k across 18 20 22 sts pick up and knit 1 st in each slip_stitch along edge of heel flap and in between heel flap and instep stitches needle 1 k28 32 36 instep sts in pattern as established needles 2 & 3 pick up and knit 1 st in between instep stitches and heel flap and in each slip_stitch along edge of heel flap needle 4 divide the sole stitches evenly between needles 1 & 4 needle 1 is the start of the round knit 1 round even as established then start gusset decreases as follows round 1 k to last 3 sts on needle k2tog k1 needle 1 k instep sts in pattern as established needles 2 & 3 k1 ssk k to end of needle
